data.eml:eml: Four new species of genus Parallaxis McAtee (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Dikraneurini) from Argentina, with a key to known species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Catalano, María Inés, Paradell, Susana L., Dietrich, Christopher H. (2013): Four new species of genus Parallaxis McAtee (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Dikraneurini) from Argentina, with a key to known species. Zootaxa 3737 (3): 241-250, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3737.3.3
